rules_text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
If an artifact or creature entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of another permanent you control to trigger and your life total is greater than your starting life total, that ability triggers an additional time.
notes:

 - Metalcraft

 - flicker
